item.title: physics724
item.description: Advanced Methods of Data Analysis (E) - physics724 Course Advanced Methods of Data Analysis (E) Course No. physics724 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 2+1 4 WT/ST Requirements for Participation: The course builds on the knowledge taught in physics716 Statistical Methods of Data Analysis and is designed as a follow-up course.
